workflow.name: Transform RSS feeds into content with GPT-4o for Medium, LinkedIn & Instagram
workflow.description:
#  üì∞ Related News to Content Marketing Automation

## Overview

This workflow automatically collects news from an RSS feed, identifies the most relevant article(s), and generates ready-to-use social media and blog content tailored for Medium, LinkedIn, and Instagram.

It‚Äôs ideal for:
	‚Ä¢	Marketing teams who want a steady flow of fresh content.
	‚Ä¢	Social media managers looking to save time on research and writing.
	‚Ä¢	Startups and creators who want consistent posting with minimal effort.

Instead of manually scanning articles and drafting posts, this automation gives you AI-generated content with your preferred tone of voice ‚Äî and even sends confirmation emails so you can review before posting.


## Prerequisites

Before using this workflow, make sure you have:
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ An n8n account (self-hosted or cloud).
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ An OpenAI API key for content generation.
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ An RSS feed URL for your industry or niche.
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ A Gmail account (or another configured email service) to receive content confirmation messages.


## Setup Instructions

1. Import the Workflow

Download and import this workflow into your n8n instance.

2. Configure the RSS Feed
	‚Ä¢	Open the RSS Read node.
	‚Ä¢	Replace the sample URL with your preferred news source(s).

3. Connect OpenAI
	‚Ä¢	Open the OpenAI Chat Model node.
	‚Ä¢	Add your OpenAI API Key in the credentials.
	‚Ä¢	(Optional) Adjust the prompts in the ‚ÄúTone of Voice Writer‚Äù or ‚ÄúInstagram & LinkedIn Writer‚Äù nodes to match your brand‚Äôs style.

4. Set Up Gmail
	‚Ä¢	Open the Send Content Confirmation nodes.
	‚Ä¢	Connect your Gmail (or another email service).
	‚Ä¢	Add the email address where you want to receive content drafts.

5. Run & Automate
	‚Ä¢	Trigger the workflow manually with Execute Workflow to test.
	‚Ä¢	Once tested, enable the Schedule Trigger node to run it automatically (e.g., daily).


## Customization Options
	‚Ä¢	üîÑ Add more platforms: extend the workflow for Twitter, Facebook, or Slack.
	‚Ä¢	‚úèÔ∏è Adjust tone & length: update prompts in AI nodes (casual, professional, humorous, etc.).
	‚Ä¢	‚úÖ Human-in-the-loop: add approval steps before publishing directly.
	‚Ä¢	üåç Change news sources: swap RSS feeds for different industries or niches.


## Example Output

LinkedIn Draft:
‚ÄúThe future of marketing is AI-driven. üöÄ A new study shows that brands leveraging automation see 3x faster content turnaround. Read more here: [link]

Instagram Caption:
‚ÄúStay ahead of the curve üåü Today‚Äôs top story in digital marketing: AI tools are reshaping how we create content. What do you think ‚Äî game-changer or hype? ü§î #AI #Marketing‚Äù


## Limitations
	‚Ä¢	AI may produce errors ‚Üí Always review generated content before posting.
	‚Ä¢	Gmail integration only sends drafts for confirmation ‚Äî direct posting is not included.
	‚Ä¢	RSS feeds vary in quality ‚Äî results depend on your chosen source.


## How It Works (Workflow Overview)
	1.	Collecting the news ‚Üí Fetch articles via RSS feed.
	2.	Best Article Finder ‚Üí Selects the most relevant item.
	3.	AI Writing ‚Üí Generates content tailored for Medium, LinkedIn, and Instagram.
	4.	Email Confirmation ‚Üí Sends drafts to your inbox for review

parameters.text:
=I want you to analyze the following for my company. Find me the best articles to use in my medium post. My company is about AI Agents & Automation. Pick up to 3. Reply ONLY with a comma-separated list of the IDs (e.g., 3,7,12).

{{ $json.forAI }}

=Maak een medium post gebaseerd op de volgende artiekelen.

{{ $json.links }}

options.systemMessage:
Jij bent de content creator voor Codint, een AI-automation & agents studio die bedrijven helpt slimmer, sneller en effici√´nter te werken.
Gebruik altijd de Codint tone of voice:
- Professioneel, innovatief en menselijk
- Korte, duidelijke en actieve zinnen
- Direct de lezer aanspreken (‚Äújij‚Äù, ‚Äúje bedrijf‚Äù)
- Technische termen simpel uitleggen met voorbeelden of metaforen
- Positief en toekomstgericht schrijven
- Eindig vaak met een vraag of call-to-action
- Gebruik empathische en resultaatgerichte taal (focus: tijd besparen, groei, eenvoud)
- Link het altijd weer terug aan codint. Codint biedt een gratis AI consult.

nodes.name: Find the urls the ai outputted

parameters.content: # Generate content based on the news for Medium, Linkedin & Instagram

# This automation is made by Codint

How to use this workflow?
1. Update the RSS feed node, to a relevant news source 
2. Change the prompt in the Best article finder to tailor for you company. Do this by using AI for an even better result.
3. Use an AI to change the system-prompts in the content generators. Make sure to include a tone of voice here!
4. Update where the emails are being send.


Potential improvements and why it isn't included:
- You could add a loop after sending the mail, so that the user can accept, change or cancel the post. We have decided to not do this to save cost, since you can create a similar gpt and update it in there for free.
- Automatically post the contents,  AI can make mistakes a human in the loop is always valuable
- More and other platforms to post on

# üì∞ Related News to Content Marketing

This workflow collects news from an RSS feed, finds the best article, and generates shareable content for Medium, LinkedIn, and Instagram using OpenAI. Drafts are sent to your email for review before posting.

## Quick Setup
	1.	RSS Feed ‚Üí Update the RSS Read node with your preferred news source(s).
	2.	OpenAI ‚Üí Add your API key in the Chat Model node and adjust prompts if needed.
	3.	Email ‚Üí Connect Gmail (or another service) in the Send Content Confirmation nodes and change mail to your personal mail
	4.	Run ‚Üí Test manually, then enable the Schedule Trigger for automation.

## ‚úÖ Perfect for marketers, social media managers, and creators who want consistent, AI-powered content.
